biotools.summary: This pipeline is based on the HiC-Pro workflow. It was designed to process Hi-C data from raw FastQ files (paired-end Illumina data) to normalized contact maps. The current version supports most protocols, including digestion protocols as well as protocols that do not require restriction enzymes such as DNase Hi-C. In practice, this workflow was successfully applied to many data-sets including dilution Hi-C, in situ Hi-C, DNase Hi-C, Micro-C, capture-C, capture Hi-C or HiChip data.
